captions.text:
We're so glad to see so many of you
Iovely people here tonight.

We especially welcome
all the representatives...

of Illinois'
Iaw enforcement community...

who have chosen to ioin us here
in the Palace Hotel Ballroom.

We certainly hope
you all enjoy the show.

And remember, people,
that no matter who you are...

and what you do
to live, thrive and survive,

there's still some things
that make us all the same.
You, me, them, everybody.

- Everybody.
- # Everybody #
# Needs somebody #
# Everybody #

# Needs somebody
to love #

- # Someone to love #
- # Someone to love #

- # Sweetheart to miss #
- # Sweetheart to miss #

- # Sugar to kiss #
- # Sugar to kiss #

[ Jake, Elwood ]
# l need you, you, you #
# l need you, you, you #
# l need you, you, you #

- # In the mornin' #
- # You, you, you #

- # When my soul's on fire #
- # You, you, you #
# Sometimes l feel #
# l feel a little sad inside #
# When my baby mistreats me #

# l never, never, never find
a place to hide, l need you #
[ Crowd Cheering ]

# Sometimes l feel
l feel a little sad inside #

# When my baby mistreats me l never,
never, never find a place to hide #

- # l need you, you, you #
- [ Audience ] # You, you, you #

- [ Jake ] # l need you, you, you #
- # You, you, you #

- # l need you, you, you #
- # You, you, you #

- # l need you, you, you, l need you #
- # You, you, you #

- [ Audience ] # You, you, you #
- People, when you find
that special somebody,

- # l need you, you, you #
- you gotta hold that man,
hold that woman !

- # l need you, you, you #
- Love him, please him,
squeeze him, please her !

- # l need you, you, you #
- Signify your feelings
with every caress...

- # l need you, you, you #
- because it's so important
to have that special somebody...

- # l need you, you, you #
- to hold, to kiss, to miss,
to squeeze and please.

- # l need you, you, you #
- [ Jake ] # Everybody #

- # l need you, you, you #
- # Needs somebody #

- # l need you, you, you #
- # Everybody #

- # l need you, you, you
l need you, you, you #
- # Needs somebody to love #

- # l need you, you, you #
- # Someone to love #

- # l need you, you, you
l need you, you, you #

- # Sugar to kiss #

- # l need you, you, you #

- # l need you, you, you #

- # When my soul's on fire #
- # You, you, you #

- # When there ain't no one around #
- # You, you, you #

- # l need you, you, you #

# Girl, l need you, you, you #

comments.text: +Milla Pizzeghella crepi il lupo ......
comments.author: Messina Salvatore

comments.text:
+Messina Salvatore Ok. Ci sentiamo fra qualche mese come quella volta della 
lince. Ciao, Salvatore e in bocca al lupo x quello che cerchi.
comments.author: Milla Pizzeghella

comments.text:
+Milla Pizzeghella Ma non lo so .....quando arriverâ ci penserò al momento 
come tutte le cose importanti.....ci si sente ....naturalmente se storci il 
naso non ti vedo....Haaaaaaa a ........scherzo.....dai
comments.author: Messina Salvatore

comments.text:
E xche' storcono il naso se lo dici? Forse xche' al sud non piace la 
pubblica sicurezza? Mi spiace, Salvatore. Sei in qualche community adatta a 
quello che cerchi?
comments.author: Milla Pizzeghella

comments.text:
+Milla Pizzeghella magari farei il becchino ...mi occupo di pubblica 
sicurezza.....
comments.author: Messina Salvatore

comments.text:
+Messina Salvatore Ma che lavoro fai? Il becchino? E che sarà mai?!? Ti 
possono reperire anche in palestra o a 1 corso di cucina o di giardinaggio. 
Prova con il volontariato: con le associazioni dei randagi e canili o le 
ambulanze. Qui su g+ cerca di socializzare con vicine e invitale ad uscire.
comments.author: Milla Pizzeghella

comments.text:
+Milla Pizzeghella beata te ....io con il lavoro che faccio non ho il tempo 
materiale di andare in palestra ...devo essere reperibile H24.....vorrei 
tanto frequentare qualcuno peró sentono il lavoro che facccio e fanno una 
faccia brutta ......e fra me e me dico...!,,Cambiamo argomento ......sono 
felice che almeno tu .....stai bene con te stessa... Ciao Cara.....
comments.author: Messina Salvatore

comments.text:
+Messina Salvatore Ciao, Salvatore. Troverai qualcuna prima o dopo. 
Dovresti uscire e frequentare gente o corsi o palestra. 
Io ho ricevuto una dichiarazione d'amore proprio con questa canzone da un 
cavaliere senza paura, piu' di 20 anni fa'.
comments.author: Milla Pizzeghella

comments.text:
Io pure ..?peró non mi vuole nessuno sono come Renzi ......tutti non lo

vita......

comments.text:
Un 5 de Marzo Muere
John Belushi (The Blues Brothers)
El actor y cantante John Belushi falleció por una sobredosis de cocaina y 
heroina en Hollywood, California. Belushi fue muy conocido por sus 
actuaciones en el dúo musical The Blues Brothers junto a Dan Aykroyd, y por 
su famosa parodia de la película Animal House en el programa televisivo 
estadounidense Saturday Night Live.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EHV0zs0kVGg﻿
